tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_fees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_date DATE,
  waste_category VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  billing_address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_fees (
  fee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  fee_amount FLOAT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  customer_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_information (
  bill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_amount FLOAT,
  bill_date TIMESTAMP,
  customer_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_fees (
  disposal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  disposal_date TIMESTAMP,
  disposal_location TEXT,
  disposal_fee DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE billing_information (
  billing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  invoice_number TEXT,
  invoice_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount_due DECIMAL,
  payment_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE customer_accounts (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  contact_person TEXT,
  email_address TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE invoices (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   invoice_number VARCHAR(10),
   customer_id INT,
   total_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
   payment_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalFees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_provider VARCHAR(255),
  fee_amount DECIMAL,
  date_collected DATE
)

CREATE TABLE BillingInformation (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  billing_address VARCHAR(255),
  bill_amount DECIMAL,
  payment_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE InvoiceRecords (
  invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_id INT,
  invoice_date DATE,
  due_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE PaymentTransactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  invoice_id INT,
  payment_date DATE,
  payment_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalLocations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50)
)
